Class ApplicantEnquiryService

java.lang.Object
service.ApplicantEnquiryService
public class ApplicantEnquiryService extends Object
Service class for handling applicant enquiry operations

    • getEnquiriesByApplicant

      public List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByApplicant(Applicant applicant)
      Gets all enquiries submitted by a specific applicant
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant
      Returns:
      List of enquiries submitted by the applicant

    • getEnquiryById

      public Enquiry getEnquiryById(String enquiryId, Applicant applicant)
      Gets an enquiry by its ID, if it belongs to the specified applicant
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry
      applicant - The applicant
      Returns:
      The enquiry, or null if not found or doesn't belong to the applicant

    • submitEnquiry

      public Enquiry submitEnquiry(Applicant applicant, String projectName, String question)
      Submits a new enquiry
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant submitting the enquiry
      projectName - The name of the project
      question - The enquiry question
      Returns:
      The created enquiry, or null if project doesn't exist

    • updateEnquiry

      public boolean updateEnquiry(String enquiryId, Applicant applicant, String newQuestion)
      Updates an enquiry's question
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry
      applicant - The applicant
      newQuestion - The new question
      Returns:
      true if updated successfully, false otherwise

    • deleteEnquiry

      public boolean deleteEnquiry(String enquiryId, Applicant applicant)
      Deletes an enquiry
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry
      applicant - The applicant
      Returns:
      true if deleted successfully, false otherwise
